title: Can New Technology Make Home Dialysis a More Realistic Option?
description: The Tablo System promises to make dialysis easier and more convenient for patients. But there are significant barriers to the technology.
dc:creator: Dawn MacKeen
category: Fresenius Medical Care AG & Company KGaA
media:credit: Mark Abramson for The New York Times
media:description: Paul Hall, who has kidney disease, undergoing dialysis at his home. New machines are giving patients like him more options.
